ModMetaData.name: Medieval Times
ModMetaData.author: Vindar
ModMetaData.description: (v. 1.974.B19) Description: Medieval Times operates as a game expansion, filling out early game / Tribal era content as Medieval era items, weapons, armour and buildings. This mod also adds 2 new types of medieval factions to the game. In addition to medieval content, some bonus items / additions were added for fun and to flesh out other additions made by "Medieval Times".
